BNP asks India to extradite PM Sheikh Hasina for trial in Bangladesh
content: Bangladesh's main opposition party, BNP, requested India to extradite former PM Sheikh Hasina to face charges of murder and other cases following her departure amid a student-led uprising. The BNP claimed that the charges are serious and fall under the extraditable category, urging India to uphold legal commitments under the bilateral treaty.
summary: Bangladesh's main opposition party, BNP, requested India to extradite former PM Sheikh Hasina to face charges of murder and other cases following her departure amid a student-led uprising. The BNP claimed that the charges are serious and fall under the extraditable category, urging India to uphold legal commitments under the bilateral treaty.

Barron Trump will attend a university in New York, Donald says he's been very good student
content: Barron Trump is likely to attend NYU as his father Donald Trump Tuesday confirmed that Barron will be attending a university in New York this fall. Barron has been a very good student, Trump said without confirming whether it's NYU -- unlike the family's traditional U-Pen. Donald Trump studied at the University of Pennsylvania but New York University seemed to be their first choice as it's only a few miles from their family building.
summary: Barron Trump is likely to attend NYU as his father Donald Trump Tuesday confirmed that Barron will be attending a university in New York this fall. Barron has been a very good student, Trump said without confirming whether it's NYU -- unlike the family's traditional U-Pen.  Donald Trump studied at the University of Pennsylvania but New York University seemed to be their first choice as it's only a few miles from their family building.

title: 'Disgusting, vile': Republicans demand Andy Beshear's apology for 'wishing rape' on JD Vance's family
content: What exactly did Vance say in 2021 on this? "It’s not whether a woman should be forced to bring a child to term but whether a child should be allowed to live even though the circumstances of that child’s birth are somehow inconvenient or a problem to society." Taking a jibe at the "inconvenience" part, Andy said 'Make him go through this'.
summary: What exactly did Vance say in 2021 on this? "It’s not whether a woman should be forced to bring a child to term but whether a child should be allowed to live even though the circumstances of that child’s birth are somehow inconvenient or a problem to society." Taking a jibe at the "inconvenience" part, Andy said 'Make him go through this'.

title: 'Who lies...like that?' JD Vance attacks Tim Walz after Gwen claims she didn't do IVF
content: Kamala Harris' running partner Tim Walz is a father of two and on several earlier occasions, Tim was open about the fertility treatment his wife underwent to conceive. But now Tim Walz's wife Gwen clarified that it was not in vitro fertilization but a different procedure called intrauterine insemination. Tim Walz, however, mentioned IVF whenever he spoke of their struggles to become parents.
summary: Kamala Harris' running partner Tim Walz is a father of two and on several earlier occasions, Tim was open about the fertility treatment his wife underwent to conceive. But now Tim Walz's wife Gwen clarified that it was not in vitro fertilization but a different procedure called intrauterine insemination. Tim Walz, however, mentioned IVF whenever he spoke of their struggles to become parents.

title: What we know about the sinking of the superyacht off Sicily
RFK Jr to join hands with Donald Trump? 'As always, I am willing...'
content: ​Independent presidential candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr's running mater Nicole Shanahan Tuesday said the Kennedy campaign is considering dropping out of the race and endorse Donald Trump. The statement came as Kennedy Jr has reportedly been spurned by both the GOP and the Democrats for he wants a cabinet position in exchange for his support.
summary: ​Independent presidential candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr's running mater Nicole Shanahan Tuesday said the Kennedy campaign is considering dropping out of the race and endorse Donald Trump. The statement came as Kennedy Jr has reportedly been spurned by both the GOP and the Democrats for he wants a cabinet position in exchange for his support.
